Text: Whoops, forgot to add: Contains issues 0000 - 0200

and now i have something to read while dr. octopus is spider-man for a few months...

thanks ShadowWolf87!

Part 2 is up.

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8021391/Spider-Man_Chronology_-_Part_2

More to come later.
Is everything Spider-Man related comics here?like marvel knights and shit?or just The Amazing spider-man and the tie-ins?

Well Marvel Knights Spider-Man was actually adjusted to be the first several issues of vol 2 of Sensational Spider-Man, but yes, it's in the Chronology. Amazing, Spectacular, Sensational, Unlimited, Peter Parker Spider-Man, Spider-Man, Friendly Neighborhood, Web Of, etc. Plus a few of the limited series that had a direct impact on the main storyline.

There's a link in the description to the list I based this on if you'd like to confirm what's here.
